job.title: Software Engineer I
job.industry: Marketing and Advertising,Information Technology and Services,Computer Software
job.description: As a Software Engineer on our Launch Engineering team you will bring a broad experience of successfully ideating and delivering value that enables Nike to increase productivity realize efficiencies and build profitable customer experiences You will be responsible for building simple and intuitive Libraries and help Nike teams to migrate and adopt our new centralized OAuth service Interest and experience in the latest methodologies goes a long way here and were looking for people who are passionate about the world of valuedriven solution delivery Youll get to work alongside truly talented teams and help them enhance their performance by promoting collaboration and innovationbrbrstronguWhat Youll Dobrustrongulli Work in a fastpaced agile environmentlili Work in true DevOps fashion owning the entire tech stacklili Solve big engineering challenges to serve our worldwide athletes at scalelili Build and maintain libraries in different languages to work with Nike OAuth serviceslili Help Nike teams to adopt and migrate to the new OAuth serviceslili Grow and keep our APIs fast efficient availablelili Collaborate with other amazing engineers to power the most exciting digital experiences for athletes on the marketbrliulstronguWhat Were Looking Forbrustrongulli 1 years of experience writing Restful APIslili Significant experience writing software in Java or Nodejslili Evidence of exposure to architectural patterns of a large highscale web application eg welldesigned APIs high volume data pipelines efficient algorithmslili Proven ability to produce highquality software that is unit tested code reviewed and checked in regularly for continuous integrationlili Hands on experience in AWSlili Strong communication skills and great product senselili Passion for sportslili Bachelors degree in Computer Science or a related Engineering field or any combination of relevant equivalent experience education and trainingbrliul
